Direct-To |Â March 2017
Electronic Charts <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Mar2017/eCharts]]>
New Jeppesen eChart Features Coming Soon
Learn about several new enhancements to the Jeppesen Electronic Terminal Charts that are coming soon to multiple aircraft platforms... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Mar2017/eCharts]]>
Honeywell Operator Conferences <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Mar2017/OC2017]]> 2017 Operator Conference Preview
This year's topics include mandates and compliance options, the current status and issues with CPDLC DCL at US airports, and new Service Information Letters (SILs)... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Mar2017/OC2017]]> Service Information Letter Briefing <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Mar2017/SILMar17]]> Incorrect Waypoint Inserted When Activating FANS Direct TO Clearance
This SIL applies to certain Gulfstream 450/550 and Embraer 170/190 aircraft when activating a FANS Direct TO clearance... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Mar2017/SILMar17]]>
Engine Insights <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Mar2017/EngineInsightsMar17]]> Single Red Line Explained
Most present-day generation TPE331 engines are equipped with a Single Red Line computer... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Mar2017/EngineInsightsMar17]]>
Honeywell Pilot Gateway <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Mar2017/PGUpdateMar17]]> Latest Updates
Take a look at new and revised publications and other resources that have recently been added to the Pilot Gateway... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Mar2017/PGUpdateMar17]]>
